What are you thankful for this week?: Naon anu anjeun hatur nuhun pikeun minggu ieu?
What are you struggling with and how can: Naon anu anjeun berjuang sareng kumaha urang tiasa ngabantosan?
How did you put into practice the script: Kumaha cara anjeun nganggur masalah / carita kami diajarkeun waktos terakhir urang tepang?
Who did you share last week's lesson wit: Saha anu anjeun bagikeun pelajaran minggu kamari sareng kumaha éta?
What needs did you meet in the community: Naon anu anjeun pendak sareng komunitas minggu kamari?
Ask someone to read the passage one para: Tanya batur maca petikan hiji paragraf dina hiji waktos.
Have a group member tell it in their own: Gaduh anggota grup nyarioskeun dina kecap sorangan.
Ask the group if they added anything or: Naroskeun grup upami aranjeunna nambihan nanaon atanapi angkat nanaon.
When you finish with ALL paragraphs, ask: Nalika anjeun réngsé ku sadaya paragraf, naroskeun ka batur di grup pikeun nyarioskeun sadayana carita ku mémori. Gaduh grup anu lereskeun naon kasalahan.
What does this passage tell us about God: Naon petikan ieu nyarioskeun ka urang ngeunaan Gusti?
What does this passage tell us about peo: Naon petikan ieu nyarioskeun ka urang ngeunaan jalma?
If this passage is true, what behaviour: Upami petikan ieu leres, naon paripolah anu kedah urang ngarobih minggu ieu?
Who will you tell this story to this wee: Saha anu anjeun bakal nyarioskeun carita ieu ka minggu ieu?
What needs can we meet in the community: Naon kabutuhan urang tiasa pendak di komunitas minggu ieu?
Would you like to discover with your fri: Naha anjeun hoyong mendakan babaturan anjeun naon Gusti
Here are some questions to get your disc: Ieu sababaraha patarosan pikeun nampi diskusi anjeun.
Would you like to discover for yourself: Naha anjeun badé mendakan diri naon anu siga Gusti sapertos sareng Gusti hoyong anjeun cicing?
Most people like to make these discoveri: Kaseueuran jalma resep ngadamel panemuan ieu dina grup sareng babaturan.
